original_text:
Although you wash yourself with soap
    and use an abundance of cleansing powder,
    the stain of your guilt is still before me,”
declares the Sovereign Lord.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 네가 잿물로 스스로 씻으며 네가 많은 비누를 쓸지라도 네 죄악이 내 앞에 그대로 있으리니

sentences.original_text: Although you wash yourself with soap
and use an abundance of cleansing powder,
the stain of your guilt is still before me,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 죄의 얼룩은 여전히 내 앞에 있느니라,
